channel.title: Color of the Number for stackable items?
channel.description: Where do I edit these? I know what I want, just were do I add them?

item.title: Color of the Number for stackable items?
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

Client.java in clients.

[code]
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1_2.anInt1444 == 33 || class9_1.anIntArray252[i3] != 1)
{
int k10 = class9_1.anIntArray252[i3];
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 10 + j7, 822, k5 + 1 + k6);
if(k10 >= 1000000000)//1b
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0xFF3333, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);

															else if(k10 >= 100000000)//100m
																		aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0x00ffff, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);
															else if(k10 >= 10000000)//10m
																		aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0x00ff80, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);
															else if(k10 >= 100000)//100k
																		aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0xffffff, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);
															else if(k10 >= 1000) //1k
																		aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0xFF00FF, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);

															else
										                                            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0xffff00, method43(-33245, k10), j6 + 9 + j7, 822, k5 + k6);
											                                }
										                                    }
                            }
                        } else[/code]

U will have to edit it to get current one like in rs.
